msbt.message: That message you sent landed a critical hit on my heart like an arrow from cupid! To think of you spending so much time crafting that beautifully written note... This gift can only begin to thank you.

I read your whole letter, and felt all of the feelings you so carefully crammed into it. It actually inspired me to be more expressive to the people who are important to me, so I'm starting with this gift for you!
Thank you so much for writing that intense fan letter and sending such a thoughtful present! I wanted to respond in kind, so I'm sending you a little something too. I hope it makes your day!
I read the letter that you sent me over and over and over. It's just packed with great stuff! In return, I hope this letter tugs at your heartstrings and tickles your brainstrings in equal measure.
When I read your message, I felt so much hype welling up inside me. You're like some kind of wizard with words! I'm going to frame your note and read it every time I need a little pick-me-up.

Yo, your message was so heartfelt that I felt it in my heart! It's so cool that you took the time to put down your thoughts and emotions on paper, and it actually inspired me to do the same. So...enjoy!
